B

BattleComputerPlayer - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class describes a computerplayer in the game.
BattleComputerPlayer() - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleComputerPlayer
BattleComputerPlayer constructor, calling the constructor in BattlePlayer.BattlePlayer() with the "super()" method.
BattleController - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class describes the main controller in the MVC theory.
BattleController(BattleView1, BattleModelInterface2) - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleController
the constructor adds listeners to the view components with help of the BattleController.theView field by using the classes: BoardListener, ResetButtonListener and ColorButtonListener.
BattleController.BoardListener - Class in battleshipprojekt3
When user clicks on BattleView1.viewBoard the BattleController.BoardListener.actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) method will use BattleController.modelInterface2 to change and update the model and use the updated information from the model to update the view with BattleController.theView.
BattleController.ColorButtonListener - Class in battleshipprojekt3
when user clicks on BattleView1.colorB the BattleController.ResetButtonListener.actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) method will use BattleController.theView to update the view.
BattleController.ResetButtonListener - Class in battleshipprojekt3
when user clicks on the BattleView1.resetB the BattleController.ResetButtonListener.actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) method will use BattleController.modelInterface2 to change and update the model and use the updated information from the model to update the view with BattleController.theView.
BattleModel - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class describes the model in the MVC theory.
BattleModel() - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleModel
constructor which initiate BattleModel.computer.
BattleModelInterface - Interface in battleshipprojekt3
Interface implemented by BattleModel and used by BattleView1
BattleModelInterface2 - Interface in battleshipprojekt3
Interface implemented by BattleModel and used by BattleController
BattlePlayer - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class describes a player in the game.
BattlePlayer() - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattlePlayer
BattlePlayer constructor which initiate necessary fields, namely the BattlePlayer.printBoard, BattlePlayer.tileBoard and BattlePlayer.ships invokes the method BattlePlayer.initTileBoard().
BattlePlayer.Ships - Class in battleshipprojekt3
 
battleshipprojekt3 - package battleshipprojekt3
 
BattleShipProjekt3 - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class contains the correlation between the components in the MVC theory.
BattleShipProjekt3() - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleShipProjekt3
constructor creates first two objects to BattleModelInterface and BattleModelInterface2, where BattleView1 gets the reference to the BattleModelInterface object and BattleModel gets the reference to the BattleModelInterface2 object.
BattleSquareView - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class describes a square in the view, the gui, which is an illustration of the class BattleTileSquare used by BattleModel.
BattleSquareView(int, int) - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleSquareView
constructor initiate BattleSquareView.row, BattleSquareView.col and sets border on the button.
BattleTileSquare - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class describes a square used by BattleModel, which has its illustration in the BattleView1 as BattleSquareView.
BattleTileSquare(int, int, String) - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleTileSquare
constructor initiate BattleTileSquare.row, BattleTileSquare.col and BattleTileSquare.state.
BattleView1 - Class in battleshipprojekt3
Class describes the main view in the MVC theory.
BattleView1(BattleModelInterface) - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleView1
constructor can take the BattleModelInterface in the future to add itself as an listener to the model.
BattleView1.TextFieldClass - Class in battleshipprojekt3
used for BattleView1.titleText, BattleView1.hitText, BattleView1.missText and BattleView1.sunkText
BattleView1.TimerClockClass - Class in battleshipprojekt3
handles the time shown on the GUI.
bColor - Variable in class battleshipprojekt3.BattleView1
 
belongToShip - Variable in class battleshipprojekt3.BattleTileSquare
 
BoardListener() - Constructor for class battleshipprojekt3.BattleController.BoardListener
 
border - Variable in class battleshipprojekt3.BattleSquareView
 
border - Variable in class battleshipprojekt3.BattleView1
